model

Class Workspace

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.tree.GNode
      • model.Workspace
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GObservable, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.tree.MutableTreeNode, javax.swing.tree.TreeNode

    public class Workspace
extends GNode
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the root node in the WorkspaceTree that contains and manipulates Projects. There is never more then one Workspace.
    Author:
    Ognjen Djuricic
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
